The Silvery Moon Tavern.name: The Silvery Moon Tavern
The Silvery Moon Tavern.desc: This is a simple tavern with a bar and several tables. To the south is a door to the outside. To the north is the kitchen. Up is the inn.

Silvery Moon Inn.name: The Silvery Moon Inn
Silvery Moon Inn.desc: You see a hallway with a three doors on each side
